backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a chatroom application with message storage, user profiles, reactions, access control, blob storage integration, and HTTP outcalls. Includes CRUD operations for chatrooms and messages, active user tracking, and admin-only deletion with password protection.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three UI changes: microphone button ring animation color change to theme blue, reduced vertical padding in MessageInput component, and restoration of text labels on message bubble react/reply buttons.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing setup, React Query hooks, UI components (Header, ChatArea, MessageBubble, MessageInput), lobby/chatroom pages, and styling configurations with details on username validation, avatar management, and message handling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport configuration for mobile support, cache-busting meta directives, and versioned script tag (v=203) to force production refresh.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component using TanStack Router with routes for lobby, chatroom, and admin pages. Conditionally renders Header/Footer based on route, hiding both on admin pages and footer on chatroom pages.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for avatar selection supporting file upload, Giphy GIF search with debounced queries, trending GIFs display, and avatar removal. Includes request tracking to prevent race conditions and derives user initials as fallback.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface with collapsible header (centered on md+ screens), pinned video area, scrollable message container with auto-scroll on new messages, reply preview functionality, and filtering to hide Creator messages without media. Displays category tags in lowercase with compact padding.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, showing live status, participant count, message count, and formatted timestamps. Fetches Twitch thumbnails and Twitter oEmbed previews on mount.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Dialog for creating chatrooms with topic, description, category selection, and media upload (image/video/Twitter). Validates YouTube and Twitch URLs, handles image uploads with progress tracking, and renders Twitter post previews using the Twitter widgets script.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with logo, username editing (alphanumeric validation, 15 char limit), avatar picker, and back-to-lobby button when in a chatroom. Manages username state and navigation.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Intentional no-op placeholder component that renders nothing, as the app is designed to work anonymously without authentication.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with avatar, timestamp, reactions, pin/unpin functionality, reply support, and embedded media (YouTube, Twitch, Twitter, Giphy, voice messages). Loads Twitter widgets and handles reaction management.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Message input component with text area (2000 char limit), image upload, Giphy search/trending, voice recording, and auto-detection of YouTube/Twitch/Twitter URLs in message text. Manages media upload progress and recording state.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned YouTube or Twitch video in an iframe with an unpin button. Renders the video embed based on media type and URL validation.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React component that renders an audio player with waveform visualization, play/pause controls, and a progress slider for voice messages. Handles audio playback state, metadata loading, and ensures only one audio plays at a time across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom React hook that debounces a value by delaying updates until a specified delay period has passed without changes. Default delay is 300ms.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Custom React hook that ensures chatrooms are freshly fetched when the actor becomes ready by purging stale cache entries (especially empty arrays) and forcing a refetch. Provides a recovery state signal and resets on actor instance changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state and identity persistence using @dfinity/auth-client. Provides authentication status, identity object, and login/clear functions to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for chatroom operations (get, search, filter by category, create, delete), message operations (get, send, delete, react), and user profile management. Includes helper functions for username generation, localStorage management, and query key normalization.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file with Tailwind directives, CSS custom properties for light/dark theme colors using OKLCH color space, mobile-specific input styles to prevent zoom on iOS, and custom styling for voice message player range inputs.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Frontend configuration constants for Giphy API integration, including API key and result limit.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility function to format numbers with compact notation (k, M, B) for displaying large numbers in a human-readable format.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from the Giphy API, returning structured GIF data with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for dynamic html2canvas library loading.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses images using canvas, preserving orientation and only returning compressed version if smaller than original.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON to extract safe preview fields (author, text, image) without DOM snapshotting, with in-flight request deduplication and caching.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed preview data with validation, versioning, and 7-day expiration.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail generation functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching functionality.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail URLs for YouTube, Twitch (clips/VODs/streams), and Twitter/X posts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page for managing chatrooms with password authentication stored in sessionStorage, displaying chatroom list with filtering and delete functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Chatroom page component that fetches and displays a specific chatroom by ID, handles loading/error states, increments view count on mount, and renders the ChatArea component when data is ready.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Lobby page component that displays a list of chatrooms with search and category filtering, handles actor connection state, includes a create chatroom dialog, and manages client-side filtering of chatroom data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme colors using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, custom animations (accordion), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking three feature requests: changing microphone animation color to theme blue, reducing chat input vertical padding, and restoring text labels for react/reply buttons on messages.
